page.title: 07Children's Days
page.content: When I get to School,I go in and I do the chairs with my friends.It takes us about 10 mts. to put out about 45 chairs. After that we go outside again for a few minutes.Then the{caretaker lets us in at 9 o'clock. The caretaker is called{Debbie}but we call her Deb for short.When we get in we hang up our coats in the{cloakroom.}It has got pegs round it for our coats and there are also{sinks}to wash our hands.(L.P) We then line up to go to{Assembly which is at five past nine. We have a hymn out of a{"Come and Praise"}book and then we have a story told to us by {Mr. Barrett}our headteacher. Then we have a prayer.(R.C.) Then we go down to class and talk. When Mr.Barrett comes he tells us to do{English.}I like doing English. We do English up to playtime I am on book three of English. It is quite hard but
